body:
### Describe the bug

```
File "<doctest sage.env.cython_aliases[5]>", line 1, in <module>
        cython(                                               # optional - sage.misc.cython
      File "/home/zhongcx/sage/src/sage/misc/cython.py", line 733, in cython_compile
        return cython_import_all(tmpfile, get_globals(), **kwds)
      File "/home/zhongcx/sage/src/sage/misc/cython.py", line 619, in cython_import_all
        m = cython_import(filename, **kwds)
      File "/home/zhongcx/sage/src/sage/misc/cython.py", line 587, in cython_import
        name, build_dir = cython(filename, **kwds)
      File "/home/zhongcx/sage/src/sage/misc/cython.py", line 389, in cython
        ext, = cythonize([ext],
      File "/home/zhongcx/sage/local/var/lib/sage/venv-python3.14/lib/python3.14/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 1154, in cythonize
        cythonize_one(*args)
      File "/home/zhongcx/sage/local/var/lib/sage/venv-python3.14/lib/python3.14/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 1277, in cythonize_one
        result = compile_single(pyx_file, options, full_module_name=full_module_name, cache=cache, fingerprint=fingerprint)
      File "/home/zhongcx/sage/local/var/lib/sage/venv-python3.14/lib/python3.14/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Main.py", line 667, in compile_single
        return run_pipeline(source, options, full_module_name, context)
      File "/home/zhongcx/sage/local/var/lib/sage/venv-python3.14/lib/python3.14/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Main.py", line 563, in run_pipeline
        err, enddata = Pipeline.run_pipeline(pipeline, source)
      File "/home/zhongcx/sage/local/var/lib/sage/venv-python3.14/lib/python3.14/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Pipeline.py", line 418, in run_pipeline
        data = run(phase, data)
      File "/home/zhongcx/sage/local/var/lib/sage/venv-python3.14/lib/python3.14/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Pipeline.py", line 400, in run
        return phase(data)
      File "/home/zhongcx/sage/local/var/lib/sage/venv-python3.14/lib/python3.14/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Pipeline.py", line 50, in generate_pyx_code_stage
        module_node.process_implementation(options, result)
      File "/home/zhongcx/sage/local/var/lib/sage/venv-python3.14/lib/python3.14/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ModuleNode.py", line 234, in process_implementation
        self.generate_c_code(env, options, result)
      File "/home/zhongcx/sage/local/var/lib/sage/venv-python3.14/lib/python3.14/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ModuleNode.py", line 569, in generate_c_code
        self._generate_annotations(rootwriter, result, options)
      File "/home/zhongcx/sage/local/var/lib/sage/venv-python3.14/lib/python3.14/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ModuleNode.py", line 583, in _generate_annotations
        rootwriter.save_annotation(result.main_source_file, result.c_file, coverage_xml=coverage_xml)
      File "/home/zhongcx/sage/local/var/lib/sage/venv-python3.14/lib/python3.14/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Annotate.py", line 124, in save_annotation
        with codecs.open(html_filename, "w", encoding="UTF-8") as out_buffer:
      File "<frozen codecs>", line 916, in open
      File "/home/zhongcx/.local/share/uv/python/cpython-3.14.0-linux-x86_64-gnu/lib/python3.14/_py_warnings.py", line 230, in _showwarnmsg
        sw(msg.message, msg.category, msg.filename, msg.lineno,
    :
    DeprecationWarning: codecs.open() is deprecated. Use open() instead.
```
In python 3.14.0, I received such warnings.

### Code to reproduce the behaviour:

```cython
# example code
```


### Expected behaviour

_No response_

### OS

Ubuntu

### Python version

python3.14.0

### Cython version

3.1.4

### Additional context
```
/home/zhongcx/sage/local/var/lib/sage/venv-python3.14/lib/python3.14/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Annotate.py:124: DeprecationWarning: codecs.open() is deprecated. Use open() instead.
```
title: [BUG] codecs.open() is deprecated. Use open() instead
